description: Russia - Removing Barriers to Coal Mine Methane Recovery and Utilization

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The project will mitigate greenhouse gas emissions by removing barriers to the implementation and financing of coal mine methane (CMM) recovery and utilisation projects in Russia. In order to reach this goal, the project will strengthen the institutional and financial framework for the promotion of CMM projects and facilitate the implementation of selected demonstration projects so as to provide a basis for the wide scale replication of similar projects in the future.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PIMS 500 CC FSP CMM project
